name: Hokan: Monster Slayer
description: Use your stealth skills and weapons arsenal to become the ultimate hunter. Will you die trying or become worthy of the title Hokan "Elite Hunter".
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win7, Win10 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win7, Win10 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 3 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
